patterns_discovered: Accessibility attribute addition to dropdown menu components
Dynamic aria attribute generation based on state
Conditional rendering with cloneElement for child components
gotchas_discovered: Need to handle both asChild and regular button scenarios for ARIA attributes
Ensuring aria-expanded reflects current menu open/closed state

approach_outcome.primary_goal: Add ARIA attributes to improve dropdown menu accessibility

recommendations: Continue adding semantic ARIA roles to interactive components
Implement consistent accessibility patterns across all UI components
Consider extracting common accessibility logic into reusable utility functions
